alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Marion; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 9:15AM CST until February 19 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Scott and Hancock Counties. Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Wise, Russell and Scott Counties. Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County. Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Marion, Sequatchie and Bledsoe Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee...Virginia... Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Grainger, Claiborne and Hancock Counties. Emory River At Oakdale TN affecting Morgan and Roane Counties. Powell River Near Arthur TN affecting Union and Claiborne Counties. Powell River Near Jonesville VA affecting Lee and Hancock Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sequatchie River near Whitwell TN. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural land occurs. At 16.0 feet, Flooding of agricultural land becomes more extensive. Water reaches the bottom of the river gage house. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 15.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 815 PM EST /715 PM CST/.
